languages.text: Иако Сотний, также известный как Комиссар, не вернулся в Темный город. Путешествуя по Простору, он выдавал себя за почтенного офицера, представителя Администратума и продавца индульгенций Экклезиархии. Жизнь свою он закончил в баре "Адептус Амасекус" во время азартной игры с самым паршивым раскладом на руке, какой можно представить. Успешно сблефовав и сорвав куш, он был застрелен соперником.

Iako Sotniy, also known as the Commissar, did not return to the Dark City. Wandering the Expanse, he impersonated an esteemed officer, a representative of the Administratum, and a merchant of indulgences from the Ecclesiarchy. His life came to an end in the bar of the Adeptus Amasecus over a game of cards. He bluffed his way out of the worst hand imaginable, hit the jackpot, and was gunned down by his opponent.
languages.original_text: Иако Сотний, также известный как Комиссар, не вернулся в Темный город. Путешествуя по Простору, он выдавал себя за почтенного офицера, представителя Администратума и продавца индульгенций Экклезиархии. Жизнь свою он закончил в баре "Адептус Амасекус" во время азартной игры с самым паршивым раскладом на руке, какой можно представить. Успешно сблефовав и сорвав куш, он был застрелен соперником.

traits.locale_text: Iako Sotniy, also known as Commissar, did not return to the Dark City. Wandering around the Expanse, he impersonated a venerable officer, a representative of Administratum, an indulgence seller from the Ecclesiarchy. His life came to an end in the "Adeptus Amasecus" bar when he was gambling in a game with the worst cards one could imagine on hand. He bluffed his way out, hit the jackpot, and was shot by his opponent.

His life came to an end in the "Adeptus Amasecus" bar when he was gambling in a game with the worst cards one could imagine on hand. He bluffed his way out, hit the jackpot, and was shot by his opponent.

Wandering the Expanse, he impersonated an esteemed officer, a representative of the Administratum, and a merchant of indulgences from the Ecclesiarchy. His life came to an end in the bar of the Adeptus Amasecus over a game of cards. He bluffed his way out of the worst hand imaginable, hit the jackpot, and was gunned down by his opponent.

languages.text: 伊科·索蒂尼，也就是被称为“政委”的那个人，再也没有回到黑暗之城。他在科罗努斯扩区中游荡，先后扮演过德高望重的官员、内政部的代表、以及国教的赎罪券商人。他的生命艾玛赛克烈酒修会酒吧画上了终点，他在纸牌游戏中靠出老千赢了牌，随后就被对手一枪打死了。
languages.original_text: Iako Sotniy, also known as the Commissar, did not return to the Dark City. Wandering the Expanse, he impersonated an esteemed officer, a representative of the Administratum, and a merchant of indulgences from the Ecclesiarchy. His life came to an end in the bar of the Adeptus Amasecus over a game of cards. He bluffed his way out of the worst hand imaginable, hit the jackpot, and was gunned down by his opponent.

traits.locale_text: 伊科·索蒂尼，也就是被称为“政委”的那个人，再也没有回到黑暗之城。他在科罗努斯扩区中游荡，先后扮演过德高望重的官员、内政部的代表、以及国教的赎罪券商人。他的生命艾玛赛克烈酒修会酒吧画上了终点，他在纸牌游戏中靠出老千赢了牌，随后就被对手一枪打死了。

languages.text: Iako Sotniy, auch bekannt als der Kommissar, kehrte nicht in die Dunkle Stadt zurück. Er irrte durch die Ausdehnung und gab sich dabei als ehrenwerter Offizier aus, als Vertreter des Administratums und als Händler für Luxusgüter in Diensten der Ekklesiarchie. Sein Leben endete wegen eines Kartenspiels im Adeptus Amasecus. Er bluffte mit dem schlechtesten Blatt, das man sich nur vorstellen kann, gewann den Jackpot und wurde dafür von seinem Gegner erschossen.
languages.original_text: Iako Sotniy, also known as the Commissar, did not return to the Dark City. Wandering the Expanse, he impersonated an esteemed officer, a representative of the Administratum, and a merchant of indulgences from the Ecclesiarchy. His life came to an end in the bar of the Adeptus Amasecus over a game of cards. He bluffed his way out of the worst hand imaginable, hit the jackpot, and was gunned down by his opponent.

traits.locale_text: Iako Sotniy, auch bekannt als der Kommissar, kehrte nicht in die Dunkle Stadt zurück. Er irrte durch die Ausdehnung und gab sich dabei als ehrenwerter Offizier aus, als Vertreter des Administratums und als Händler für Luxusgüter in Diensten der Ekklesiarchie. Sein Leben endete wegen eines Kartenspiels im Adeptus Amasecus. Er bluffte mit dem schlechtesten Blatt, das man sich nur vorstellen kann, gewann den Jackpot und wurde dafür von seinem Gegner erschossen.

languages.text: Iako Sotniy, surnommé le commissaire, ne retourna jamais dans la Cité Crépusculaire. Sillonnant les Étendues, il incarna tour à tour un officier bien sous tout rapport, un représentant de l'Administratum et un marchand d'indulgences de l'Ecclésiarchie. Il trouva la mort lors d'une partie de cartes qu'il disputait dans le bar de l'Adeptus Amasecus. Ayant tiré une main catastrophique, il choisit de bluffer, toucha le pactole et se fit abattre par son adversaire.
languages.original_text: Iako Sotniy, also known as the Commissar, did not return to the Dark City. Wandering the Expanse, he impersonated an esteemed officer, a representative of the Administratum, and a merchant of indulgences from the Ecclesiarchy. His life came to an end in the bar of the Adeptus Amasecus over a game of cards. He bluffed his way out of the worst hand imaginable, hit the jackpot, and was gunned down by his opponent.

traits.locale_text: Iako Sotniy, surnommé le commissaire, ne retourna jamais dans la Cité Crépusculaire. Sillonnant les Étendues, il incarna tour à tour un officier bien sous tout rapport, un représentant de l'Administratum et un marchand d'indulgences de l'Ecclésiarchie. Il trouva la mort lors d'une partie de cartes qu'il disputait dans le bar de l'Adeptus Amasecus. Ayant tiré une main catastrophique, il choisit de bluffer, toucha le pactole et se fit abattre par son adversaire.

languages.text: Iako Sotniy, también conocido como el Comisario, no volvió a la Ciudad Siniestra. En sus viajes por la Extensión, se hizo pasar por un oficial de alta estima, un representante del Administratum y un vendedor de indulgencias de la Eclesiarquía. Su vida llegó a su fin en el bar Adeptus Amasecus por una partida de cartas. Se tiró un farol para ganar con la peor mano posible, se llevó una fortuna y su oponente le acribilló a balazos.
languages.original_text: Iako Sotniy, also known as the Commissar, did not return to the Dark City. Wandering the Expanse, he impersonated an esteemed officer, a representative of the Administratum, and a merchant of indulgences from the Ecclesiarchy. His life came to an end in the bar of the Adeptus Amasecus over a game of cards. He bluffed his way out of the worst hand imaginable, hit the jackpot, and was gunned down by his opponent.

traits.locale_text: Iako Sotniy, también conocido como el Comisario, no volvió a la Ciudad Siniestra. En sus viajes por la Extensión, se hizo pasar por un oficial venerable, un representante del Administratum y un vendedor de indulgencias de la Eclesiarquía. Su vida llegó a su fin en el bar Adeptus Amasecus por una partida de cartas. Se tiró un farol para ganar con la peor mano posible, se llevó una fortuna y su oponente le acribilló a balazos.

languages.text: コミッサーとしても知られたイアコ・ソトニーは、仄暗き都に帰ることはなかった。エクスパンスをさまよう彼は、立派な高官や行政局の代表者、帝国聖教会から訪れた贅沢品の商人など、さまざまな人物になりすました。彼の生涯はアデプトゥス・アマセックのバーで、カード勝負をめぐって幕を閉じた。彼は想像を絶する最悪の手札からハッタリをかまして大当たりを引き当てたことで、対戦相手に銃殺されたのだ。
languages.original_text: Iako Sotniy, also known as the Commissar, did not return to the Dark City. Wandering the Expanse, he impersonated an esteemed officer, a representative of the Administratum, and a merchant of indulgences from the Ecclesiarchy. His life came to an end in the bar of the Adeptus Amasecus over a game of cards. He bluffed his way out of the worst hand imaginable, hit the jackpot, and was gunned down by his opponent.

traits.locale_text: コミッサーとしても知られたイアコ・ソトニーは、仄暗き都に帰ることはなかった。エクスパンスをさまよう彼は、立派な高官や行政局の代表者、帝国聖教会から訪れた贅沢品の商人など、さまざまな人物になりすました。彼の生涯はアデプトゥス・アマセックのバーで、カード勝負をめぐって幕を閉じた。彼は想像を絶する最悪の手札からハッタリをかまして大当たりを引き当てたことで、対戦相手に銃殺されたのだ。

languages.text: Komiser olarak bilinen İako Sotniy, Kara Şehir'e geri dönmedi. Enginlik'te dolandı; saygıdeğer bir subay, bir Administratum temsilcisi ve Ekleşiarşi adına haz ticareti yapan bir tüccar kimliğine büründü. Hayatı, Adeptus Amasekus'taki bir barda kart oynarken sona erdi. Akla hayale gelebilecek en kötü elle blöf yaptı, büyük ödülü kazandı ve rakibi tarafından vuruldu.
languages.original_text: Iako Sotniy, also known as the Commissar, did not return to the Dark City. Wandering the Expanse, he impersonated an esteemed officer, a representative of the Administratum, and a merchant of indulgences from the Ecclesiarchy. His life came to an end in the bar of the Adeptus Amasecus over a game of cards. He bluffed his way out of the worst hand imaginable, hit the jackpot, and was gunned down by his opponent.

traits.locale_text: Komiser olarak da bilinen İako Sotniy, Kara Şehir'e geri dönmedi. Enginlik'te dolandı, saygıdeğer bir subay, bir Administratum temsilcisi ve Ekleşiarşi için haz ticareti yapan bir tüccar kimliğine büründü. Hayatı, Adeptus Amasekus'taki bir barda kart oynarken sonlandı. Akla hayale gelebilecek en kötü elle blöf yaptı, büyük ödülü kazandı ve rakibi tarafından vuruldu.
